column4: hi all.  installed ubuntu 5.04.  after booting, screen goes black but on with no sound.  pressed ctl-alt-f1.  logged in.  sudo killall gdm.  startx.  screen goes black and off completely.  but can hear logging in music.  what to do for a complete newbie?
you might want to try reconfiguring your x
you can switch bitween windows using Ctrl + Alt + F1 I think...
you don't know whether you're using nvidia or ATI...?
there is; I think it's lspci
better leave it on what it's on, then.
did you say you did the whole reconfiguration?
